review_title: An anti-poverty organization that promotes high quality work and exciting work experiences
job_title: Program Advisor in Rio de Janeiro
pros: Good work environment, high quality work, exciting work experiences, a lot of travel, strong international profile, dynamic organization, allows employees to study.
cons: Relatively low salaries for medium/lower level staff, large salary discrepancy between coordinators and medium/lower level staff, insufficient focus on career growth, heavy work load.
